pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.1: If he accepts the mission, finds out the response, and reports back, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.2: If he accepts the mission, and finds out the response, but does not report back, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.3: If he accepts the mission, but does not find out the response, yet reports back, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.4: If he accepts the mission, but neither finds out the response, nor reports back, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.5: If he does not accept the mission, yet finds out the response and reports back, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.6: If he does not accept the mission, yet finds out the response, but does not report back, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.7: If he neither accepts the mission, nor finds out the response, yet reports back, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.12.8: If he does not accept the mission, nor finds out the response, nor reports back, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.1: A man tells a number of monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.2: “Venerables, find out about such-and-such a woman.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.3: If they all accept the mission, all find out the response, and all report back, they all commit an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.4: A man tells a number of monks,

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.6: If they all accept the mission, all find out the response, but only one reports back, they all commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.13.9: If they all accept the mission, but only one finds out the response, yet all report back, they all commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.15.1: If he fulfills the agreement when he goes, but not when he returns, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.15.2: If he does not fulfil the agreement when he goes, but he does when he returns, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.15.3: If he fulfills the agreement both when he goes and when he returns, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.15.4: If he neither fulfills the agreement when he goes nor when he returns, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.16.2: if he goes because of business for the Sangha, for a shrine, or for one who is sick;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.16.4: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.16.7: Not a woman, a woman who lacks sexual organs;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:4.16.9: And he was a matchmaker for paṇḍakas.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.1: At one time a man told a monk,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.2: “Sir, please find out about such-and-such a woman.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.3: When the monk got there, he asked some people,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.7: “The Buddha has laid down a training rule.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.8: Could it be that I’ve committed an offense entailing suspension?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.9: He told the Buddha, who said,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.1.11: but there’s an offense of wrong conduct.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.2.1: At one time a man told a monk,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.2.2: “Sir, please find out about such-and-such a woman.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.2.3: When the monk got there, he asked some people,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.2.8: “That’s a woman who lacks sexual organs, Venerable.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.2.11: but there’s an offense of wrong conduct.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.3.1: At one time a certain woman quarreled with her husband and went to her mother’s house.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.3.2: A monk who associated with that family reconciled them.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.3.6: “There’s no offense if they’re not divorced.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.4.1: At one time a monk acted as a matchmaker for paṇḍakas.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss5:5.4.5: The training rule on matchmaking, the fifth, is finished.
